languages.text: {n}Хальбрандт прочищает горло и, кажется, собирается ответить, но ловит острые взгляды Ульфара и Торбальда, отчего немедленно умолкает.{/n}
{n}Halbrandt clears his throat and opens his mouth to reply, but he catches the sharp glances of Ulfar and Thorbald and swiftly changes his mind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хальбрандт прочищает горло и, кажется, собирается ответить, но ловит острые взгляды Ульфара и Торбальда, отчего немедленно умолкает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Halbrandt clears his throat and opens his mouth to reply, but he catches the sharp glances of Ulfar and Thorbald and swiftly changes his mind.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: {n}Halbrandt carraspea y se prepara para responder, pero las miradas cortantes de Ulfar y Thorbald hacen que cambie de parecer al momento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Halbrandt clears his throat and opens his mouth to reply, but he catches the sharp glances of Ulfar and Thorbald and swiftly changes his mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Halbrandt carraspea y se prepara para responder, pero las miradas cortantes de Ulfar y Thorbald hacen que cambie de parecer al momento.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: {n}哈尔布兰特清了清嗓子，张嘴想回答，但他看到乌尔法和索巴德锐利的目光之后，立刻改了主意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Halbrandt clears his throat and opens his mouth to reply, but he catches the sharp glances of Ulfar and Thorbald and swiftly changes his mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}哈尔布兰特清了清嗓子，张嘴想回答，但他看到乌尔法和索巴德锐利的目光之后，立刻改了主意。{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: {n}ハルブラントは咳払いをし、答えようと口を開いたが、ウルファーとトールバルドの鋭い視線を感じ、すぐに考えを変えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Halbrandt clears his throat and opens his mouth to reply, but he catches the sharp glances of Ulfar and Thorbald and swiftly changes his mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハルブラントは咳払いをし、答えようと口を開いたが、ウルファーとトールバルドの鋭い視線を感じ、すぐに考えを変えた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: {n}Halbrandt s'éclaircit la gorge et ouvre la bouche pour répondre, mais change rapidement d'avis en croisant le regard noir que lui adressent Ulfar et Thorbald.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Halbrandt clears his throat and opens his mouth to reply, but he catches the sharp glances of Ulfar and Thorbald and swiftly changes his mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Halbrandt s'éclaircit la gorge et ouvre la bouche pour répondre, mais change rapidement d'avis en croisant le regard noir que lui adressent Ulfar et Thorbald.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: {n}Halbrandt räuspert sich und öffnet den Mund, um zu antworten, doch als er Ulfars und Thorbalds scharfe Blicke sieht, überlegt er es sich eilig anders.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Halbrandt clears his throat and opens his mouth to reply, but he catches the sharp glances of Ulfar and Thorbald and swiftly changes his mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Halbrandt räuspert sich und öffnet den Mund, um zu antworten, doch als er Ulfars und Thorbalds scharfe Blicke sieht, überlegt er es sich eilig anders.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC

languages.text: {n}Boğazını temizleyen Halbrandt, cevap vermek için ağzını açtığı sırada Ulfar ve Thorbald'ın keskin bakışlarını görüp vazgeçiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Halbrandt clears his throat and opens his mouth to reply, but he catches the sharp glances of Ulfar and Thorbald and swiftly changes his mind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Halbrandt boğazını temizliyor ve cevap vermek için ağzını açıyor ama Ulfar ve Thorbald'ın keskin bakışlarını görünce vazgeçiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HalbrandtSpacewolfMarine_WarCouncilKTC
